classType: Party Buff - Crit Rate + Crit Damage

pros: Simple skills with variety for different situations
Stationary mobbing - do not have to move much
Mobile with vertical jump and multi-directional dash
Lots of powerful attacks that blow up enemies
cons:
Lots of complex mechanics and wordy skill descriptions that are forgettable
  • The class is simple in that it just works
Cannot Open Job Advancement to and from Pathfinder

baseStats: Excludes attack specfic bonuses, Hyper Skill passives, Guidance of the Ancients, Evasion Boost buff, Link Skills, and buffs with long cooldowns
Crit Rate: [ +40%] [ +10%] [ +20%]
Crit Damage: [ +15%] [ +10%] [ up to +20% from debuff]
Final Damage: [ +10% to Ancient / Enchant Force Skills]
Abnormal Status Resistance: [ 60 & up to 100]

buffInfo.active: , , ,
buffInfo.summons: , (120 - 105s cd), (60s cd), (120s cd), (120s cd)
buffInfo.buffCd: (120s cd), (120s cd)
buffInfo.buffFifth: (180s cd), (120s cd)

details: Can be stacked up to 3 times, once for each unique Explorer Archer to reach Master Level

info: To create one, choose the 'Pathfinder' option in the Character Creation screen. Pathfinders have their own separate creation button like Dual Blade and Cannoneer. As well, they have a different story than regular Explorers but are part of the same class group

build: -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
details: Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Cardinal Force - Reinforce, Bountiful Enhance and Extra Strike
  • Ancient Force - Boss Rush and Enchant Enhance

extraContent.title: Relic Gauge
extraContent.content:
Pathfinders have a special gauge called the Relic Gauge that is used to cast certain Skills. Attacking enemies will charge up your Relic Gauge. At the center of the gauge, there is also a special emblem that changes depending on which the skills you use. Some skills will change depending on what the emblem is

There are three types of emblems (from left to right): Deluge, Burst and Torrent

primary.name: Three Snails
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Damage 40
primary.desc: Throws a snail shell forward that deals fixed amount of damage

primary.name: Recovery
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Recover 72 HP over 30 sec

primary.name: Nimble Feet
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Duration 12, Movement Speed: 20

primary.name: Return to Partem
primary.shortDesc: Returns you to Karuppa Town when used.\nCooldown: 600 sec
details: Gained from completing a Pathfinder story quest

primary.name: Ancient Curse
primary.shortDesc:
Level 1: Critical Rate -20%, Defense -20%, Status Resistance -20
Level 2: Defense -20%, Status Resistance -20
Level 3: Status Resistance -20
Level 4: Curse has been lifted
primary.desc: Your stats are reduced due to an unknown curse
details: Effects are reduced each time you Job Advance
Ancient Bow skills do not consume arrow items

primary.name: Curse Dampening I
primary.shortDesc: Activated when attacking with a Cardinal Force skill. Accumulates up to level 10, with a Critical Rate increase of 2% for each level.\nCan only be activated when the curse is reducing your Critical Rate.
primary.desc: When attacking with a Cardinal Force attack, you gain a stacking %Crit Rate buff
details: Only active when your %Crit Rate is affected by the Ancient Curse

primary.name: Cardinal Deluge
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Max Enemies Hit: 4. Blasts an arrow that deals 90% damage 4 times.
primary.desc: Fires several arrows that seek out enemies
details: Changes the emblem at the center of the gauge to 'Deluge'

primary.name: Double Jump
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, allows you to jump a greater distance
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice
While in the air, double-tapping the Up Arrow Key will perform a vertical jump
Double-tapping the Down Arrow Key will allow you to descend quickly

primary.name: Archery Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Range +120, Movement Speed +30, Attack Speed: +1.\nMax Movement Speed Increased to 160

primary.name: Forceful Shot
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +40%

primary.name: Relic Charge I
primary.shortDesc: Relic Gauge Maximum Charge: 1000\nAttacking an enemy with a Cardinal Force skill charges the relic gauge by 10, and by 5 for every guided arrow of Cardinal Deluge that hits an enemy.\nIf a different Cardinal Force skill is used next, the cooldown for all Ancient Force skills will be reduced by 0.5, except for the 5th Job Advancement skills.
primary.desc: Attacking enemies with Cardinal Force skills will charge your Relic Gauge
details: If your next skill is a different Cardinal Force skill than the one currently used, the cooldown of all Ancient Force skills will be reduced (except 5th Job Skills)

primary.name: Curse Dampening II
primary.shortDesc: Activated when attacking with a Cardinal Force skill. Accumulates up to level 10, with a Defense increase of 2% for each level.\nCan only be activated when the curse is reducing your Defense.
primary.desc: When attacking with a Cardinal Force attack, you gain a stacking %DEF buff
details: Only active when your %DEF is affected by the Ancient Curse

primary.name: Cardinal Deluge Amplification
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15. Fires an arrow that deals 200% damage to up to 5 enemies 4 times. If a boss monster is within the attack's range, fires 1 additional arrows.
details: Increases %Damage of attack
If a boss monster is within your attack range, you will fire 1 additional arrow

primary.name: Cardinal Burst
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Max Enemies: 4, Damage: 200%, Attack Count: 4, when the arrow explodes.
primary.desc: Fires an arrow that explodes when it makes contact with an enemy or reaches its maximum range
details: Changes the emblem at the center of the gauge to 'Burst'

primary.name: Swarm Shot
primary.shortDesc: Relic Gauge Cost: 50, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 200%, Attack Count: 4. Creates 2 magical arrows that deal 100% damage 4 times each time this attack pierces an enemy.\nCooldown: 10 sec.
primary.desc: Firsts an arrow forward that will split off and seek out enemies if it hits an enemy

primary.name: Ancient Bow Booster
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 11, Increases attack speed of Ancient Bow for 300 sec.
primary.desc: Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)

primary.name: Bountiful Deluge
primary.shortDesc: When using Cardinal Burst while the relic displays the Deluge emblem, there is a 40% chance to create 3 magical arrows.\nThese magical arrows will chase and attack nearby enemies for 2 sec, dealing 100% damage 3 times.
primary.desc: When using while your relic is displaying the 'Deluge' emblem, you have a chance to create homing arrows
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Ancient Bow Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Ancient Bow Mastery: +50%, Attack Power +30

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase STR by 30 and DEX by 30.

primary.name: Curse Dampening III
primary.shortDesc: Activated when attacking with a Cardinal Force skill. Accumulates up to level 10, with a Status Resistance increase of 2% for each level.\nCan only be activated when the curse is reducing your Status Resistance.
primary.desc: When attacking with a Cardinal Force attack, you gain a stacking Abnormal Status Resistance buff
details: Only active when your Abnormal Status Resistance is affected by the Curse

primary.name: Cardinal Burst Amplification
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Max Enemies: 5, Damage: 300%, Attack Count: 4, when the arrow explodes.\nIf the total number of enemies struck is lower than the maximum, this skill's final damage will increased by an additional 10% for each enemy below the max.
details: Increases %Damage of attack
Additionally, gains increased %Final Damage the fewer enemies hit

primary.name: Cardinal Torrent
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Consumes 1 Swiftstrike Charge\nDeals 400% damage 5 times to up to 6 nearby enemies.\nYou gain 1 Swiftstrike Charge every 7 sec, and can store up to a maximum of 5.
primary.desc: When used with an Arrow Key, you will dash in the direction you pressed
details: If no Arrow Key is pressed, you will swing your weapon at your current location
Changes the emblem at the center of the gauge to 'Torrent'

Uses a special resource called Swiftstrike Charge
  • You gain one Swiftstrike Charge every 7 secs (up to 5 at a time)

primary.name: Triple Impact
primary.shortDesc: Relic Gauge Cost: 50. Explosions deal 400% damage 5 times to up to 4 enemies.\nCooldown 10 sec
primary.desc: Leap up into the air and fire 3 exploding arrows downwards
details: If you are already airborne, the arrows will be fired immediately

primary.name: Shadow Raven
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, summon a Raven for 220 sec. Deals 390% damage to up to 4 enemies at once.\n[Passive Effect: Increases your Defense by 30%]
primary.desc: Summons a raven that fights alongside you
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %DEF
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Cursebound Endurance
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 58, increases Status Resistance by 30 for 300 sec. If afflicted by an abnormal status while this skill, Status Resistance will be increased by 20, and can be stacked up to 5 times.\n[Passive Effect: Increases Status Resistance by 30 and all Elemental Resistances by 30%]
primary.desc: Increases Abnormal Status Resistance
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases Abnormal Status Resistance and %Elemental Resistance
While active, when affected by an Abnormal Status, you gain a stacking buff of Abnormal Status Resistance

primary.name: Guidance of the Ancients
primary.shortDesc: Each time the Relic Gauge has been filled up by 1000, your Final Damage is increased by 15% for 24 sec.\nRestores HP/MP by 8% when activated\n[Passive Effect: Increases Max HP by 50%]
primary.desc: Each time you fill up your Relic Gauge by 1000, you gain a %Final Damage buff and restore some %HP/MP
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Max HP

primary.name: Bountiful Burst
primary.shortDesc: When using Cardinal Deluge while the relic displays the Burst emblem, there is a 40% chance to create 2 magical arrows.\nThese magical arrows will chase nearby enemies for 2 sec and explode on contact, dealing 150% damage to up to 4 enemies 3 times.
primary.desc: When using while your relic is displaying the 'Burst' emblem, you have a chance to create homing arrows
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Evasion Boost
primary.shortDesc: Dodge Chance: 30%, all attacks following a successful dodge for 1 sec will be critical hits.
primary.desc: Grants a chance to dodge attacks
details: Dodging an attack causes all your attacks to be Critical Hits briefly

primary.name: Archer's Essence
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +10%, Damage: +10%, Ignore Defense: +30%

primary.name: Relic Charge II
primary.shortDesc: The Relic Gauge is charged by 20 when attacking an enemy with a Cardinal Force skill, and by 10 per hit from Cardinal Deluge's guided arrows.\nThe Shadow Raven will charge the Relic Gauge by 10 for each enemy hit by its attacks. When you use another Cardinal Force skill, all Ancient Force and Enchant Force skills will have their cooldowns reduced by 1 sec, except for 5th Job Advancement skills.
primary.desc: Attacking enemies with Cardinal Force skills will charge your Relic Gauge
details:
If your next skill is a different Cardinal Force skill than the one currently used, the cooldown of all Ancient Force and Enchant Force skills will be reduced (except 5th Job Skills)
  • Ancient Force and Enhance Force skills both consume your Relic Gauge to activate
Attacks from will also charge your Relic Gauge

primary.name: Curseweaver
primary.shortDesc: Using certain skills will inflict enemies with the Ancient Curse debuff, which lasts for 15 sec and can be stacked up to 5 times.\nSkills that utilize the Ancient Bow deal an increased 4% Critical Damage to enemies for each stack of the curse debuff currently afflicting them.
primary.desc: Certain skills will inflict enemies with a stacking debuff
details: [Debuff]: Ancient Bow skills deal increased %Crit Damage for each stack
will also target enemies that have the Ancient Curse debuff

primary.name: Advanced Cardinal Force
primary.shortDesc:
When using Cardinal Force skills, MP Cost: 30
Cardinal Deluge
Fires an arrow that deals 300% damage to up to 6 enemies 4 times. Fires 1 additional arrow if a boss monster is within range.
Cardinal Burst
An exploding arrow deals 400% damage to up to 6 enemies 4 times. If total enemies struck is lower than the max, an additional 10% is added to the final damage for each enemy below the max.
Cardinal Torrent
Consumes 1 Swiftstrike Charge. Deals 540% damage 5 times to up to 7 nearby enemies. You gain 1 Swiftstrike Charge every 7 sec up to a maximum of 5. You cannot be pushed back while casting, and each enemy hit will receive 1 stack of the Ancient Curse debuff.
details: Increases %Damage of attack
and have bigger animations and hitboxes
When using , you cannot be pushed back while casting and enemies hit by the attack will gain a stack of Ancient Curse

primary.name: Glyph of Impalement
primary.shortDesc: Relic Gauge Cost: 100, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 800%, Attack Count: 6. Final Damage increased by 10% per stack of the Ancient Curse debuff.\nCooldown: 15 sec.
primary.desc: Releases a burst of spikes that damage nearby enemies
details: Deals increased %Final Damage to enemies with Ancient Curse depending on how many stacks
Can be used while casting other skills

primary.name: Combo Assault
primary.shortDesc: Relic Gauge Cost: 150. Bow attack deals 500% damage to up to 4 enemies 7 times, inflicting 1 stack(s) of the Ancient Curse debuff.\nArrow attack deals 550% damage to up to 10 enemies 5 times.\nCooldown: 20 sec
primary.desc: Releases a flurry of arrows at your location with special effects depending on the emblem that is displayed on your Relic Gauge
details: [Deluge]: Increases the range of the attack
[Burst]: Attack hits only one enemy but deals increased damage
[Torrent]: Attack applies additional stacks of the Ancient Curse on enemies

primary.name: Sharp Eyes
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 45, Critical Rate: +20%, Critical Damage: +15%, Duration: 300 sec

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60, Increases all stats assigned APs by 15% for 900 sec

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 360 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds

primary.name: Bountiful Torrent
primary.shortDesc: When using Cardinal Deluge or Cardinal Burst while the relic displays the Torrent emblem, your next 6 attacks within the following 7 sec have a 40% chance to apply 1 stack of the Ancient Curse debuff.\nPermanently increases your Attack Power by 20%.
primary.desc: When using or while your relic is displaying the 'Torrent' emblem, you have a chance inflict debuff
details: Additionally permanently increases %Attack

primary.name: Ancient Archery
primary.shortDesc: Bountiful Deluge Damage: +50%p, Bountiful Burst Damage: +50%p\nSwarm Shot First Arrow Damage: +350%p, Additional Magical Arrows' Damage: +200%p, Triple Impact Explosion Damage: +200%p.\nFinal Damage of Ancient Force and Enchant Force Skills: +10%, Boss Damage: +50%
primary.desc: Increases the %p Damage of , , and
details: Additionally increases %Final Damage of Ancient Force and Enchant Force skills and %Boss Damage

primary.name: Ancient Bow Expertise
primary.shortDesc: Ancient Bow Mastery: +70%. Attack Power: +60, Critical Damage: +10%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now grants flat Attack and increases %Crit Damage

primary.name: Illusion Step
primary.shortDesc: Dexterity: +80, Avoidability: +30% chance, Damage taken reduced by 20%.

hyperPassive.name: Cardinal Force - Reinforce
details: Increases %Damage of Cardinal Force skills

hyperPassive.name: Cardinal Force - Bountiful Enhance
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Activation rate and debuff application chance: +10%
details: Increases activation rate of and
Also adds a chance for to add stacks of Ancient Curse

hyperPassive.name: Cardinal Force - Extra Strike
details: Increases the number of hits per attack of Cardinal Force skills

hyperPassive.name: Ancient Force - Boss Rush
details: Increases %Boss Damage of Ancient Force skills

hyperPassive.name: Ancient Force - Guardbreak
details: Increases %Ignore DEF of Ancient Force skills

hyperPassive.name: Ancient Force - Enchant Enhance
details: Increases %Damage of Enchant Force skills

hyperActive.name: Awakened Relic
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, Instantly fills the Relic Gauge to its maximum capacity. The amount charged counts toward the activation of Guidance of the Ancients.\nFor 30 sec, 1 additional magical arrows will be created when Bountiful Deluge and Bountiful Burst are used, and the time required to generate a unit of Swiftstrike Energy is reduced to 3 sec\nCooldown: 120 sec
hyperActive.desc: Instantly fills your Relic Gauge to its maximum capacity
details: While buff is active, 1 additional homing arrow will be created when , and are activated
While buff is active, Charges for will generate faster

hyperActive.name: Ancient Astra
hyperActive.shortDesc: Relic Gauge Cost: 65 per sec. Hold down the key to continuously attack up to 7 enemies, for 400% damage, 6 times.\nThis skill will end early if the Relic gauge doesn't have enough points.\nCooldown: 80 sec
hyperActive.desc: Fires a variety of arrows depending on the emblem that is displayed on your Relic Gauge
details:
[Deluge]: Fires a barrage of arrows that create additional homing arrows when an enemy is hit
  • You cannot move while casting
[Burst]: Fires a deadly explosive arrow that can be aimed using the Up and Down Arrow Keys
[Torrent]: Fires a barrage of arrows while also being able to move at the same time

hyperActive.name: Epic Adventure
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Applies to any Explorer class in the party

fifthMain.name: Nova Blast
fifthMain.shortDesc: Relic Gauge Cost: 200 or more required to use the skill. Consumes all energy built up in the Relic Gauge to activate an explosion 6 times that deals 900% damage 15 times to up to 15 enemies. Invulnerable while casting.\nIf the consumed Relic Gauge exceeds certain thresholds (25%/50%/75%/100%), Final Damage will be increased by 25%/50%/75%/100%, respectively. Ignore Def +100%\nCooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: Consumes your entire Relic Gauge (min. 200) to fire a deadly explosive attack
details: Attack gains increased %Final Damage based on the amount of Relic Gauge consumed
You are invincible while casting
Attack has 100% Ignore DEF

fifthMain.name: Raven Tempest
fifthMain.shortDesc: Relic Gauge Cost: 300, Duration: 25 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 900%, Attack Count: 5\nCharges the Relic Gauge by 20 when attacking\nDirection Change Cooldown: 2, Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: Transforms into a giant tornado that stops when it hits an enemy
details: Can only be used when is active
You can change the direction of the skill by pressing the Skill Key
Attacks charge up Relic Gauge
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Obsidian Barrier
fifthMain.shortDesc: Relic Gauge Cost: 500, Duration: 15 sec, decreases damage taken from attacks that deal a fixed percent of damage by -20%.\nThe shield will deal 700% damage 4 times to up to 8 enemies within its radius.\nCooldown: 200 sec
fifthMain.desc: Creates a protective barrier for your and your party members that has differing effects based on the emblem displayed on your Relic Gauge and damages enemies within it (except for Deluge)
details: Party members gain %Damage Reduction (from %Max HP attacks), receive no touch damage from monsters, and all attacks towards enemies affected with the Ancient Curse

[Deluge]: Grants each party member a personal barrier
  • Does not damage enemies within the barrier
[Burst]: Increases the size of the barrier
[Torrent]: Creates a barrier that can be moved
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Relic Unbound
fifthMain.shortDesc:
Relic Gauge Cost: 250
Deluge Enhancement: rapidly shoot arrows that periodically deal 1000% damage for 22 sec
Burst Enhancement: shoot arrows that explode 4 times periodically dealing 1250% damage up to 10 enemies 8 times for 10 sec, can shoot up to 4 arrows
Torrent Enhancement: sets up to 3 Relics that periodically attacks up to 6 enemies with 1400% damage 5 times for 40 sec
Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: Places down a relic that attacks nearby enemies whenever you attack
details: [Deluge]: Fires a continuous barrage of arrows forward

[Burst]: Fires a focused arrow that explodes
  • Up to 4 arrows can be fired at a time
[Torrent]: Fires an arrow in a triangular zone

meta: Pathfinder is DEX archer class part of the Explorers class group. Pathfinders have a special gauge called the Relic Gauge that is used to cast certain Skills. Attacking enemies will charge up your Relic Gauge. At the center of the gauge, there is also a special emblem that changes depending on which the skills you use
